phrs.translation: 回忆, 备忘录, 温故篇, 印象风
备忘录, 图片作为记忆的辅助
往日情怀男性香水, 往日情怀

sentences.sentence: It came in the form of an unsigned document known as an aide-memoire, which was delivered directly to the Iranian delegation.
sentences.translation: 它以一种未签署的文件作为辅助备忘录，直接发给了伊朗代表团。

sentences.sentence: For anyone still stumbling over the words, wall-to-wall coverage in official newspapers, radio and television networks has provided an aide memoire.
sentences.translation: 对于那些依然对歌词不熟悉的人来说，在官方报纸、电视台上铺天盖地地提供着背诵的园地。

sentences.sentence: WHEN Michael Williams, a British geographer, sat down in 1994 to write a chronicle of deforestation, "Deforesting the Earth", he had a useful aide-memoire.
sentences.translation: 1994年，英国地理学家，迈克尔•威廉姆斯坐在桌前，准备写一部滥伐森林的编年史《滥伐地球》，窗外的一景让他若有所思。
